languages.text: {n}Маражай осклабляется.{/n} "Ответ, которого я ждал! Никто, оказавшись в моих руках, не остается прежним — и ты не исключение, {name}".
{n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай осклабляется.{/n} "Ответ, которого я ждал! Никто, оказавшись в моих руках, не остается прежним — и ты не исключение, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."
{n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."
{n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."
{n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋露齿而笑。{/n}“这正是我想要的答案！只要落入我的手中，没有一个人能保持他们原本的模样。你也不例外，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋露齿而笑。{/n}“这正是我想要的答案！只要落入我的手中，没有一个人能保持他们原本的模样。你也不例外，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai esboza una cruel sonrisa.{/n} «¡La respuesta que estaba esperando! Nadie vuelve a ser quien era después de caer en mis manos, y tú no ibas a ser la excepción, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai esboza una cruel sonrisa.{/n} «¡La respuesta que estaba esperando! Nadie vuelve a ser quien era después de caer en mis manos, y tú no ibas a ser la excepción, {name}».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Voilà la réponse que j'attendais ! Une fois entre mes mains, aucun être n'est capable de résister au changement qui s'opère en lui. Vous ne faites pas figure d'exception, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Voilà la réponse que j'attendais ! Une fois entre mes mains, aucun être n'est capable de résister au changement qui s'opère en lui. Vous ne faites pas figure d'exception, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "Auf diese Reaktion habe ich gewartet! Wenn ich jemanden in den Händen habe, wird derjenige für immer verändert – da bildet Ihr keine Ausnahme, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "Auf diese Reaktion habe ich gewartet! Wenn ich jemanden in den Händen habe, wird derjenige für immer verändert – da bildet Ihr keine Ausnahme, {name}."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがニヤリと笑う。{/n}「それこそが待ち望んでいた答えだ！ひとたび俺の手にかかれば、誰もが以前のままではいられない…お前も例外ではないんだ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがニヤリと笑う。{/n}「それこそが待ち望んでいた答えだ！ひとたび俺の手にかかれば、誰もが以前のままではいられない…お前も例外ではないんだ、{name}」

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, ."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sırıtıyor.{/n} "Beklediğim cevap! Elime düştükten sonra hiç kimsenin eski hâlinden eser kalmaz. Sen de bu hususta istisna değilsin {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grins.{/n} "The answer I was waiting for! No one, once in my hands, remains as they were before — and you are no exception, {name}."
